function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'strlen' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i<=m' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i<=m' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'j<=n' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'j<=n' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<=m' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<=n' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'a (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'b (line 4)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'b' live at the end of function 'min'?
Does variable 'c (line 4)' remain in use at the end of function 'min'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'd[i][j] = min(d[i][j-1]+1, d[i-1][j]+1, d[i-1][j-1]+cost);' be considered dead code?
